In Game: mid-sixteenth century. Feudal Japan, which once was under the authority of the emperor, is fragmented and divided among many warring clans. In the role of Daimyo - the leader of one of them - the player to fight, solve various business problems and subtle diplomatic game to achieve the main goal: to end the fighting and unite the country under his command and became the ruler of Japan.
